name: Speed Loop
description:
Speed Loop is a high-speed circular game that put your reflexes to the test!

Wait for the loopy circle to be in one the zones and tap the screen!
You're wondering how could be that hard? The loop turns faster with each cycle, it quickly becomes a hardcore challenge!

This is an addictive reflex game aimed at people who love to challenge their friends and break their highscore!

Speed Loop features:
- Simple but challenging gameplay
- Awesome but hard to catch bonus rewards
- Tons of customization items
- Facebook features to crush your friends

Unlock new themes, circles, discs and sound packs to customize your experience.
Come back everyday to earn a daily reward and buy everything in the shop!

Test your reflexes by catching the bonus rewards. Maybe it will give you money, maybe it will increment your score or other surprises...
Send your highscore to the online leaderboards to show who's the real master of this circular adventure!
